title: 05/31/21 DPS Hour 2 Geoff Schwartz
itunes:title: 05/31/21 DPS Hour 2 Geoff Schwartz
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan Patrick, react to the Lakers losing to the Suns as Anthony Davis goes down with an injury. The guys debate Kyrie Irving's legacy and react to the controversy in his return to Boston. Former NFL Offensive Lineman Geoff Schwartz joins the guys to look at what will happen with the Falcons and Julio Jones. Plus, Doug pinpoints the exact moment where the Mavericks let the Clippers back into the series.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
